appDescription.message: Quickly insert preset Prompt content in web input fields through commands.

saveSelectedPrompt.message: Save the selected text as a prompt

quickInput.message: Quick input: Type in any input field

quickSave.message: Quick save: Select text and press

savePrompt.message: Save selected text as a prompt

rightClickSave.message: Right-click save: Select text and right-click to choose "Save this prompt"

shortcutNotConfigured.message: Shortcut not configured, possibly due to conflicts.

dismissReminderTitle.message: Don't remind me about shortcut setup

firefoxShortcutHelp.message: After opening the extensions page, please click the gear icon at the top right and select "Manage Extension Shortcuts"

saveFailed.message: Save failed, please try again later

descriptionExample.message: Describe the purpose of this category...

disabledTips.message: When disabled, prompts in this category will not be displayed

clickAddCategory.message: Click the "Add Category" button to create your first category.

addCategoryFailed.message: Add category failed, please try again later

updateCategoryFailed.message: Update category failed, please try again later

deleteCategoryFailed.message: Delete category failed, please try again later

toggleCategoryStatusFailed.message: Toggle category status failed, please try again later

categoryManagementDescription.message: Here, you can manage your categories, including adding, editing, deleting, and enabling/disabling categories.

globalSettingsDescription.message: Manage global configuration options for the extension.

closeModalOnOutsideClickDescription.message: When enabled, clicking outside the modal area will automatically close the modal. When disabled, the modal can only be closed using the ESC key or close button.

shortcutsDescription.message: View and manage extension keyboard shortcuts. Shortcuts are managed by the browser and need to be modified in the browser's extension settings page.

openPromptSelectorDescription.message: Quickly open the prompt selector in any input field

openOptionsPageDescription.message: Quickly open the extension's configuration and management page

pleaseManuallyNavigateToShortcuts.message: Please manually navigate to your browser's extension shortcuts settings page.

globalSettingsHelpText1.message: Global settings affect the entire extension behavior and take effect immediately after modification.

globalSettingsHelpText2.message: Keyboard shortcuts are managed by the browser and the setup method may vary between different browsers.

createFirstCategory.message: Create your first category to start organizing your prompts!

confirmDeleteCategoryMessage.message: Are you sure you want to delete this category? All prompts in this category will be moved to the default category. This action cannot be undone.

confirmDeletePromptMessage.message: This action cannot be undone, the prompt will be permanently deleted.

notionSyncDisabled.message: Local to Notion sync is disabled.

searchPromptTitleContentTag.message: Search prompts by title, content or tags...

clickAddPrompt.message: Click the "Add New Prompt" button to create your first prompt.

tryOtherTermsOrCategories.message: Please try other search terms or select other categories.

loadDataFailed.message: Failed to load data, please try again later

savePromptsFailed.message: Failed to save prompts, please try again later

exportPromptsFailed.message: Failed to export prompts, please try again later

noValidPromptsInFile.message: No valid prompts found in the file

importPromptsConfirm.message:
You already have $existingCount$ prompts, found $newCount$ prompts to import.
Click "OK" to import new prompts, or "Cancel" to abort.

noNewPromptsFound.message: No new prompts found, import cancelled.

noValidPromptsInRemoteData.message: No valid prompts found in remote data

remoteImportPromptsConfirm.message:
You already have $existingCount$ prompts, found $newCount$ prompts from remote source.
Click "OK" to import new prompts, or "Cancel" to abort.

noMatchingPromptsInCategory.message: No prompts matching "$searchTerm$" found in "$categoryName$" category

createFirstPrompt.message: Create your first prompt to boost productivity

importInstructionsDetail.message: Enter the URL link containing valid prompt JSON data, and the system will automatically fetch and import the data.

notionDatabaseIDHelp.message: You can extract the ID from the Notion database page URL

autoSyncDescription.message: Automatically sync local changes to Notion

apiKeyStorageNote.message: API key is securely stored in browser

permissionsNote.message: Ensure Notion integration has read/write permissions

appendModeDescription.message: Only add prompts that exist in Notion but not locally

overwriteModeDescription.message: Completely replace local data with Notion data

oneTimeOperationNote.message: Note: This is a one-time operation

syncToNotionDescription.message: This operation will sync local prompts to Notion, including:

createMissingPrompts.message: Create prompts that don't exist in Notion

updateChangedPrompts.message: Update existing prompts in Notion with changes

notionAPIKeyOrDatabaseNotConfigured.message: Notion API key or database ID not configured. Cannot sync. Please complete configuration first.

syncTaskInProgress.message: A sync task is already in progress. Please wait.

startingSyncToNotion.message: Starting sync to Notion, please wait...

startingNotionOverwriteSync.message: Starting overwrite sync from Notion to local, please wait...

errorTriggeringNotionOverwriteSync.message: Error triggering overwrite sync from Notion

startingNotionAppendSync.message: Starting append sync from Notion to local, please wait...

errorTriggeringNotionAppendSync.message: Error triggering append sync from Notion

syncingFromNotionOverwriteMessage.message: Syncing from Notion with overwrite, please wait...

syncingFromNotionAppendMessage.message: Syncing from Notion with append, please wait...

fillAPIKeyAndDatabaseID.message: Please fill in API key and database ID

invalidNotionAPIKeyOrDatabase.message: Invalid Notion API key or database ID

tryChangingSearchOrCategory.message: Try changing search terms or selecting another category

tryOtherKeywords.message: Try using other keywords to search

navigationHelp.message: ↑↓ Navigate · Tab Switch Category · Enter Select

clickInputBoxFirst.message: Please click on a text input box or editable element first, then use the shortcut to open the prompt selector.

noEnabledPromptsAlert.message: No enabled prompts found. Please add and enable some prompts in the extension first.

errorGettingSelectedText.message: Content script: Error getting selected text

popupShortcutReminderSet.message: Popup: Set to not remind shortcut setup issues

categoryPageToggleError.message: Category page: Error toggling category status

shortcutSaveNoTextResponse.message: Shortcut save: No text received from content script or content script did not respond.

backgroundShortcutOpenSelector.message: Background script: Received shortcut command to open prompt selector

backgroundShortcutSelectorSent.message: Background script: Sent open prompt selector message to active tab

backgroundNoActiveTab.message: Background script: No active tab found

backgroundSendMessageError.message: Background script: Failed to send message to tab:

backgroundGetSelectedTextError.message: Background script: Failed to get selected text or open options page:

backgroundPromptsInitialized.message: Background script: Successfully initialized default prompts

logoutMaybeIncomplete.message: Logout may not be complete, please refresh the page

loginInProgress.message: Login in progress, please complete authentication in the opened window...

loginErrorTryLater.message: Error during login process, please try again later

notionIntegrationDescription.message: Through Notion API integration, you can sync your prompt library between Quick Prompt and Notion database, enabling cross-platform data sharing and backup.

variableFormatTip.message: You can add variables using the {{variableName}} format, for example:

variableExample.message: You are now a {{role}} with {{years}} years of development experience, specializing in {{skills}}.

disabledStatusTip.message: When disabled, it won't appear in the selector

googleAuthDescription.message: Connect your Google account to access more features when using Quick Prompt, such as cloud sync, cross-device access, and more.

googleAuthBenefits.message: Through Google authentication, you can get the following features:

secureCloudStorage.message: Securely store and sync your prompts to the cloud

crossDeviceAccess.message: Seamlessly switch and use your prompt library across different devices

googleServiceIntegration.message: Use Google services for additional shortcuts

privacyAssurance.message: We only request necessary permissions, and your data security will be strictly protected. You can revoke authorization and delete related data at any time.

pleaseEnterVariableValues.message: Please enter values for the following variables. The variables in the prompt will be automatically replaced after completion.

notesPlaceholder.message: Record usage scenarios, compatible models, input/output examples, notes, etc...

notesHelp.message: Information that only shows in the list view, not in the selector. You can use it to record usage scenarios, compatible models, input/output examples, notes and other details about this prompt.

exportCategoriesFailed.message: Failed to export categories, please try again later

Click "OK" to import new categories, click "Cancel" to do nothing.
